Description:
We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled Construction Project Manager with expertise in Building Projects, Construction Project Management, and Royal Commission regulations. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in the field of infrastructure development, including commercial, industrial, and residential villas. This is a key leadership role where you will oversee all aspects of construction projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.Responsibilities:Manage and oversee the entire construction project lifecycle, including planning, budgeting, scheduling, and execution.
Ensure compliance with Royal Commission regulations and requirements throughout the project.
Coordinate and collaborate with various stakeholders, including architects, engineers, contractors, and subcontractors.
Monitor project progress, identify potential issues, and implement proactive measures to mitigate risks.
Develop and maintain project budgets, track expenses, and provide regular financial reports.
Supervise and manage on-site construction activities, ensuring adherence to safety standards and quality control.
Review and approve project designs, specifications, and construction plans.
Conduct regular inspections to ensure work quality and compliance with project requirements.
Manage project documentation, including contracts, permits, and change orders.
Provide timely and accurate project updates to senior management and clients.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Construction Project Manager in building projects, preferably within the Royal Commission framework.
Strong knowledge and understanding of Royal Commission regulations and requirements.
Extensive experience in infrastructure development, including commercial, industrial, and residential villas.
Excellent project management skills, with the ability to oversee multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong leadership and team management abilities.
